directions: In a large skillet over medium-low heat, melt 3 tablespoons margarine.  Add cabbage and onions.  Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender and browned.
Meanwhile,  bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.  Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
Stir cooked pasta into cabbage and add remaining margarine.  Stir in cottage cheese and sugar; cook until heated through.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: 1 medium head cabbage, cored and sliced thin
title: Cottage Noodles and Cabbage
